Summary: Saw 2 objects hovering and then moving in the sky above my courtyard.
divs: sighting detailson 9\28\2013 at 4:22 pm, i was returning from walking my dog. we were in our courtyard and saw a huge + shaped object with a similarly sized curved object next to it. it was a burnished metal and sitting silently in the air. i would estimate it at 5-8000 feet high, 300+ feet in length. i pointed at it with my phone and thought i got a picture of it. i ran inside to get my camera. i called to my room mate and she came out and witnessed it as it was crossing the tree line of our building. my new sony sx50hs camera refused to focus with multiple attempts. see attached photos (photo-shopped image of the ufo structures) actual photo taken of object (only a small dot & peripheral surrounding dots appear on camera) on 10\10\13 a perfect heart shaped cloud appears at the same place in the sky. (see photo)
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sandy Springs
There were no other sightings in Sandy Springs on or around September 28th 2013
